entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
